Genom att vara rådgivare för både leverantörer och återförsäljare, ser vi till att förenkla processer, skräddarsy lösningen och säkerhetsställa att partners utvecklar sin affär.

name: ALTAIR SOLUTIONS s.r.o
description:
Společnost Altair Software s.r.o. byla založena v roce 2009 a od té doby se specializuje na poskytování služeb v oblasti informačních a komunikačních technologií, zejména pak na vývoj komplexních podnikových řešení, implementaci a customizaci ERP a CRM systémů, systémovou integraci, mobilní technologie, konzultace a technickou podporu. 

Nabídka našich služeb se opírá o kompletní sadu nástrojů a řešení společnosti Microsoft, která jsme schopni nejen nasadit a customizovat, ale především integrovat s ostatními podnikovými systémy a nástroji, mimo značku Microsoft. Největší přidanou hodnotou je schopnost obsáhnout požadovaný proces v jeho celé šíři a vytvořit komplexní řešení inhouse.

Stručný rozpis našeho zaměření:

Digitalizace výroby - Integrace průmyslu 4.0+
o	Synchronizace nehomogenních systémů (EDI komunikace, řízení výroby, stroje (plc), sklady, speciální zařízení, analytika, reporting atp.)
o	Systémová integrace (middleware, webové služby, memory streamy, programové API)
o	Implementace a customizace MS Dynamics 365 (ERP, CRM, Office) + Azure®
o	Strojové vidění a neuronové sítě (identifikace a strukturalizace dat, predikce závad ve výrobním řetězci atp.)

Vývoj Software:         
o	Cloudová řešení v Azure®      
o	Databáze MS SQL a Oracle®
o	Mobilní aplikace (Android, IOS) včetně POP, NFC a rozšířené reality (AR)
o	Webové aplikace všeho druhu (.NET, PHP, *.js atp.)

 Zárukou kvality naší práce je tým certifikovaných specialistů, kteří musejí projít přísnými certifikačními procesy nastavenými společností Microsoft.

name: RDT Limited
description:
RDT has been developing software systems for insurers since 1991, helping them benefit from cutting edge technologies that increase efficiency, raise profitability and reduce fraud. Collaboration is one of our key principles and we work closely with our clients to create an infrastructure that’s right for their products and customers – one that delivers speed, market intelligence, and above all better business performance and competitive advantage.

That’s why RDT is a technology leader, an industry innovator you can rely on for growth and success, today and tomorrow.

RDT creates some of the UK’s most widely used insurance software. Our technology is popular because it makes insurance more profitable to sell and manage, and easier to buy. We’ve always been known for our innovations – in 1996 we developed the UK’s first insurance comparison website. Our latest initiative, the Atlas suite, can be tailored to fit any size of business; our clients range from household names to new disruptors, from volume market players with books of $2billion to niche players generating high return. Whether your business has reached the point where it needs the next push for growth, or is more speculative and innovative, we are experienced in delivering solutions and services to help you achieve your goals.

Atlas is flexible so that all our customers have the exact solution to suit them. It’s been designed to be hosted in Azure, with some solutions scaling up and down as demand dictates, meaning businesses pay only for what they use, when they use it.

name: Engage Squared Pty Ltd
description:
Engage Squared is on a mission to empower employees to enjoy work more - using Microsoft tools to make work more productive, collaborative and connected.

We work with large organisations to empower teams and individuals to use new technology to work productively (by migrating to O365, undertaking adoption and change management campaigns and / or configuring information and records management solutions), to help their leaders connect with their staff (by developing powerful new Intranets and digital workplaces built on modern SharePoint, and by rolling out Yammer), and to tailor Office 365 workloads to boost productivity (using all of the Microsoft 365 suite, including PowerApps and Power Automate).

Our values lie in our tenacity, sincerity, creativity, and agility, working alongside you in deploying the most beautiful modern intranets and Microsoft solutions to suit your company's needs. We work closely with our customers on user experience design, solution development, technology change and successful digital adoption.

name: Stretch AB
description:
Stretch är guldpartner med Microsoft inom applikationsutveckling och är silverpartner inom samarbetsplattformar och Business Intelligence. Vi är även Microsoft Cloud Solution Provider och kan leverera alla Microsofts moln-plattformar där vi fokuserar på Azure och Office 365. Vi är kravställare, leder, designar, utvecklar och förvaltar lösningar baserade på Microsofts plattform.

Vi älskar teknik, men vi vet att det inte är tekniken som skapar värde i våra leveranser. Det är vår nyfikenhet på er verksamhet och vår förmåga att omvandla verksamhetens behov till en användbar lösning som skapar affärsvärde. Våra arkitekter och utvecklare arbetar gärna direkt med verksamheten. De använder verksamhetsspråk tillsammans med visualisering för att skapa ett tätt samarbete med fokus på affären snarare än tekniken.

As a participant of the United Nations Global Compact, Persistent is committed to aligning strategies and operations with universal principles on human rights, labor, environment, and anti-corruption, as well as take actions that advance societal goals. description:

name: RED MAPLE TECHNOLOGIES LLC
description:
Red Maple™ is a leading provider of innovative solutions designed to enhance the functionality and usability of Microsoft Dynamics 365. With a history dating back to 2003, Red Maple has been empowering businesses worldwide with its innovative extensions and additions for Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations, Business Central, and Customer Engagement platforms.

Trusted by over 500 companies globally, Red Maple's robust portfolio of products is tailored to meet the diverse needs of businesses across various industries. Our solutions are architected to seamlessly integrate with Microsoft Dynamics 365, offering users unparalleled flexibility, agility, and efficiency.

At Red Maple™, we understand the importance of simplifying complex processes and maximizing operational performance. Our suite of solutions is designed to streamline workflows, reduce complexity, and drive tangible results for our clients. Our payment solutions optimize payment processing, including card present, card not present, ACH, e-wallet payments, Level II/III processing, surcharging, PCI 4.0 readiness, and omni token capabilities. Our solutions also enhance financial management capabilities for complex commission structures, rebates, recurring revenue, and revenue recognition.

With a dedicated team of experts and a focus on innovation, Red Maple is poised to continue revolutionizing the Microsoft Dynamics 365 ecosystem. We are driven by delivering solutions that drive measurable value for our clients.

Discover the power of Red Maple and unlock the full potential of your Microsoft Dynamics 365 investment. Contact us today to learn more about our solutions and how we can help elevate your business to new heights.

name: Tasklet Factory
description:
Introducing Tasklet Mobile WMS, the ultimate barcode scanning warehouse management solution with seamless integration to Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central, Dynamics NAV, Dynamics 365 for Finance & Supply Chain, and Dynamics AX. 

Tasklet Mobile WMS integrates directly with your ERP, allowing seamless control and management of all warehouse activities through handheld computers. This turnkey solution can be up and running in just a few hours, immediately cutting down error rate and enhancing your level of productivity. 

Get the functionality and real-time updates in your ERP system you need to successfully manage all your inbound, internal, and outbound warehouse processes. 

Key features of Tasklet Mobile WMS: 

Seamless ERP Integration: Direct integration with your ERP system 

User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive design ensures ease of use and quick adoption by your team 

- Customizable: Easily tailored to fit your specific warehouse needs 

- Reliable Offline Functionality: Continue processing orders even without an internet connection 

- Global Trust: Used and trusted by satisfied customers in more than 40 countries 

Tasklet Mobile WMS is available as a Free Trial – get started today: https://bit.ly/3NkWtdD

name: LMIS AG
description:

name: mnemonic AS
description:
mnemonic is helping customers all over the world to protect their assets against increasingly advanced cybersecurity threats. We’re one of the largest pure play security companies in Europe, with a team of 350+ security specialists working on some of the most demanding challenges within information security.
We are acknowledged by Gartner as a notable vendor in delivering Managed Detection and Response (MDR) services, threat intelligence and advanced targeted attack detection. As well as the preferred security partner of the region’s top companies and a trusted source of threat intelligence to Europol and other law enforcement agencies globally. 

We deliver a comprehensive cloud security services designed to take advantage of Microsoft XDR, Sentinel and the entire Microsoft Security Portfolio. Our proven approach helps our customers protect against, detect and respond to threats in their cloud environments. Our advanced specialisations in Cloud Security, Threat Protection, and our strategic partnership with Microsoft, ensures seamless protection across all cloud environments for our customers.

name: TDI SERVICES
description:
GROUPE ALTIORE MT, DES FEMMES ET DES HOMMES VOUS ACCOMPAGNENT POUR QUE VOTRE SYSTEME D’INFORMATION REPONDE A VOS OBJECTIFS D’ENTREPRISE  

Depuis plus de 25 ans nous construisons des relations privilégiées, pérennes avec nos clients et nos collaborateurs. 

Le groupe Altiore MT est né du rapprochement des sociétés ESSENTIA, INSECO et TDI SERVICES. L’étendue de nos prestations et la rigueur de notre méthodologie nous permettent d’être à vos côtés en intervenant de manière continue tout au long de la vie de votre système d’information au travers de deux métiers dans le secteur informatique et dans l’intégration de solutions de gestion.

	SECTEUR INFORMATIQUE
•	Ingénierie de projets : intégration de matériels, d’infrastructures réseau, de systèmes de sécurité et de logiciels associés sur site ou en mode cloud
•	Solutions collaboratives : Mise en place de solutions collaboratives autour des solutions Azure, Microsoft Office 365 et la digitale workplace Teamway
•	Conseils et expertise IT : Accompagnement en amont de vos projets
•	Infogérance et services managés : Prise en charge de la gestion informatique par notre service de support utilisateur : supervision, prévention, sécurisation… 

	 SECTEUR LOGICIEL DE GESTION : 
•	Logiciels & ERP : Formation e-learning et mise en place de solutions collaboratives autour des outils Azure, Microsoft Office 365 et la digital workplace Teamway.
•	Formation & transfert de compétence : La certification Qualiopi garantit des formations de qualité sur l’ensemble de nos solutions de gestion. Centre de formation agréé Datadock et OPCO, vous bénéficiez d’aides au financement de ces prestations.  
•	Assistance & support : Seul interlocuteur dans la prise en charge de vos demandes, nous mettons à disposition des spécialistes métiers pour vous assister
•	Conseils & expertise de gestion : Audit de votre organisation interne, rédaction de votre cahier des charges et accompagnement dans le choix d’une solution de gestion adaptée.

Nous construisons et entretenons des relations humaines avec nos clients. Que vous soyez, petite, moyenne ou grande entreprise, du secteur public ou relevant du privée, notre équipe pluridisciplinaire prend le temps de vous écouter et de vous apporter des conseils éclairés.

Nos 9 agences réparties sur toute la Nouvelle Aquitaine vous garantissent une écoute active, une proximité et une très grande réactivité.

name: Nodefusion d.o.o.
description:
Nodefusion provides services in the domain of information technology to enterprises, organizations, and institutions of all sizes. The Company’s activities cover the following segments:

• planning, sale and implementation of hardware solutions
• design and integration of IT systems based on Microsoft technologies
• Managed Cloud services
• development of software solutions for Microsoft platforms


Our extensive experience in the integration of private and public Cloud solutions guarantees a quality implementation – whether you require a private Cloud for internal Business needs, or a public Cloud which is to provide Services to your Customers.

We also offer the migration and/or integration of your existing on-premise IT solutions with Microsoft’s Office 365, Intune and Azure services.

Our goal in the development of custom software for specific needs is to enable our clients to do business in an efficient way, give them full visibility of their business data – without duplication and with maximum integration with other IT systems. We are focused on business processes and modeling the IT system in accordance.

The development is oriented towards Microsoft technologies (Azure, .Net). We also develop customized business solutions and applications for the Microsoft Dynamics CRM and SharePoint platforms.

The experience in integration with other Microsoft solutions (Azure, Intune, Office 365, System Center) and in-depth knowledge of IT system infrastructure provide us with an advantage in architectural design and the development of quality software.

Our Mission:
To follow the latest trends in the IT industry and enable our clients to take full advantage of what technology can offer for the betterment of their businesses, allowing them to become more competitive in the market.

Our Vision:
Continuous investment into knowledge, human resources and technology paves the way to our success.

name: Noventiq International El Salvador SA
description:
Noventiq (marca registrada de Softline Holding PLC) es un proveedor de soluciones y servicios globales líder en transformación digital (DX) y ciberseguridad, con sede y cotización en Londres. 
Los 6.400 empleados de Noventiq trabajan en casi 60 países de Asia, América Latina, Europa, Oriente Medio y África. La empresa desarrolló su capacidad y experiencia prestando servicios a más de 84.000+ organizaciones de todos los sectores a nivel mundial; forjando relaciones duraderas con cientos de los mejores proveedores de TI; e invirtiendo en sus propias soluciones, servicios y plataformas.
Noventiq es uno de los principales socios de License Solution (LSP) y Cloud Solution Provider (CSP) de Microsoft y cuenta con su propia plataforma automatizada de facturación y aprovisionamiento de clientes para el autoservicio y la gestión de suscripciones. Noventiq posee el más alto de los estatus de socio de Microsoft: 16 competencias Gold de 18 posibles. Somos uno de los pocos socios de Microsoft que ha conseguido el estatus Azure Expert Managed Service Provider (MSP). También somos miembros de Microsoft Intelligent Security Association (MISA) y estamos clasificados por Gartner como Visionarios en la competencia de Software Asset Management.
Nuestra especialidad son los entornos multinube con un enfoque en la tecnología de Microsoft, junto con nuestra experiencia en software y servicios y soluciones propias. Ofrecemos una amplia cartera de servicios de nube xaaS de los principales proveedores de nube junto con nuestros propios servicios de transformación, gestión, seguridad y modernización de las cargas de trabajo. Además, suministramos una amplia gama de software, como sistemas operativos, virtualización, seguridad, CAD/CAM, negocios, colaboración y herramientas de gestión.  Nos aseguramos de que nuestros clientes tengan éxito con su transformación digital proporcionándoles servicios complementarios de implementación, formación, consultoría, gestión de activos de TI y soporte técnico.
Nuestros experimentados gestores de cuentas y más de 2.500 ingenieros identifican, entregan y dan soporte a soluciones DX seguras y eficientes. Nuestros expertos en FinOps están disponibles para garantizar que estas soluciones sigan siendo eficientes a medida que el consumo evoluciona con el tiempo.

Sie finden uns an zwölf Standorten in Deutschland und ca. 160 weltweit.

New Horizons has been a recognized Microsoft training partner since Microsoft first launched a training company certification and accreditation program in the early 1990s. name: Skyline Software Systems, Inc
description:
Skyline Software Systems, Inc. is the leading provider of 3D earth visualization software and services. Skyline offers a platform of applications, tools and services for the creation and dissemination of customized, interactive, photo-realistic 3D environments. Focusing on core competencies of 3D earth visualization, data fusion, terrain analysis and collaboration, Skyline delivers a set of tools that delivers on the needs of enterprise customers: flexibility; efficiency and robustness. Skyline’s applications and services have been selected as the best-of-breed solution by government, military, intelligence and commercial clients across the globe.

Skyline’s core product offering, SkylineGlobe, is a web-enabled, interactive 3D globe that supports macro earth level views down to photorealistic street-level urbanscapes and underground views. As a data fusion platform, SkylineGlobe enables the enterprise users to aggregate information in their native format, projections, and resolutions from disparate “data silos”, into a single, unified, easy to understand 3D view. Real-time data fusion capabilities enables the integration of “live” data feeds including full motion video, asset tracking, and sensor data. SkylineGlobe’s architecture incorporates a very robust API/SDK that offers unparalleled flexibility to create customized user-interfaces and tools tailored to meet the needs of a wide range of end users.

Skyline’s Photomesh product addresses the problem of 3D building model availability. PhotoMesh allows the rapid and intuitive generation of complete photo-textured 3D mesh models from sets of unordered 2D images. PhotoMesh’s automated 3D modeling process greatly reduces the time, effort, expense and resources associated with traditional 3D model creation.

name: CONNECTING LONDON LIMITED
description:
Since establishment in 1983 Connecting London has been committed to delivering an exception IT Support experience by excelling in rapid response and assuring business continuity.

Throughout the years Connecting London managed to sustain a loyal customer base through our winning formula of excellent service at a fair cost. We are proud to have acquired most of our business through customer referral.

Building close relationships with our clients allow us to fully understand their IT needs and apply our best practices to implement, support and manage their IT systems.

Our mission is to enable end-users to reap the maximum benefit from available technologies. To achieve this our dedicated team of engineers will apply their comprehensive IT expertise to cover your technology needs, allowing your business to get the best return on IT investments.

name: Infosys Limited
description:
Infosys is a global leader in next-generation digital services and consulting.
Infosys and Microsoft have a rich legacy of partnership spanning over 15 years. As partners, our goal is to bring together our complementary strengths to deliver specialized capabilities, industry solutions, and services that will help our customers and empower every person and every organization to achieve more.

Infosys has pivoted in Microsoft Services space during 2018 by creating integrated Microsoft Cloud Business Unit with vision to accelerate the synergy of 3’clouds of Microsoft (Azure, M365, D365) and 4 service offerings with digital transformation journey of our clients in integrated services Infosys Internet of Things (IOT) focuses on transformation of our client’s business by providing connected processes, products and infrastructure in a real-time and ubiquitous manner, across industry verticals, thereby enhancing the competitive advantage, customer experience and operational efficiencies.

Infosys offers a range of specialized engagements from adoption of roadmaps for smart manufacturing to go-to-market strategies for connected products. Infosys is also a founding partner in the consortium that developed the catch Industrie 4.0 (I4.0) Maturity Index and have strong partnership ecosystem. Infosys offers easily deployable solutions for enterprises that gather data from sensors to provide actionable business insights. We help companies manage and maintain services across the IoT stack through our asset management solutions that provide factory visibility, asset monitoring, predictive maintenance, AI-based analytics and more.

Local and remote resources for a cost effective solution. We have successfully delivered more than 200+ Microsoft Dynamics project across 57 customers around the globe. Infosys has also successfully rolled more than 25+ Case management and Power Platform for its Enterprise Customers.

name: Compello AS
description:
Compello Gruppen har som målsetning å bli en ledende aktør i Europa innenfor områdene EDI, eFaktura og fakturagodkjenning. Hver eneste dag etterstreber vi om å tilrettelegge for at organisasjoner spiller bra sammen. Dette gjør vi ved å håndtere fakturaer, transaksjoner og andre bilag på en trygg, rask og sikker måte. Nettopp derfor er vår visjon – We make organizations play well together!

Compello Gruppen utgjør mer enn 90 ansatte fordelt i Oslo, Larvik, Stockholm og München. Vi etterlever våre verdier om å være til å stole på, modige, lagspillere og lekne. Hovedkontoret ligger på Fornebu utenfor Oslo hvor store deler av våre utviklere, økonomer, selgere, konsulenter, markedsførere, ledere og support-konsulenter er lokalisert.

Våre kollegaer, samarbeidspartnere og kunder er drivkraften i vår virksomhet. Sammen med våre partnere har Compello Gruppen mer enn 7000 kunder i 20 land. Dette utgjør mer enn 100.000 personer som bruker Compello-løsninger hver eneste dag.

Som et internasjonalt selskap er Compello opptatt av å være en god samfunnsaktør og arbeidsgiver. Vi har derfor inngått noen strategiske samarbeid for å bidra til et samfunn for innovasjon, mangfold og et bedre miljø. Compello driver konkrete tiltak for å øke kvinneandelen og har per i dag en av IT-bransjens høyeste kvinneandel på 40%.

name: Infotrans Caribbean N.V.

We make a difference in the region by delivering excellence in ICT. We see ourselves as partners in our customers’ business, helping to enable their objectives through the intelligent use of ICT. As ICT continues to evolve, Infotrans Caribbean invests in its teams and relationships with global leaders who are creating the new waves in technology. With our top-notch team of more than eighty (80) certified and experienced professionals, we collaborate with innovative, steadfast and industry-defining technology leaders to deliver our portfolio of ICT solutions. This advanced support network helps us, and by extension, our customers, to gain efficiencies, build knowledge and increase performance, ensuring that the solutions we bring exceed expectations.

Thakral One is a privately held technology consulting and services company headquartered in Singapore, with a primary focus on people, processes and technology. From strategy, governance to implementation, we deliver services and solutions that help drive transformation, optimize operations, enhance data-driven decision making, and improve application performance towards achieving business goals. We aim to realize desired outcomes through close collaboration with our clients’ people, processes and the optimization of technology.  
 
Our approach emphasizes heavily on capability development and client enablement, to ensure longer term sustainability and returns, long after the completion of our assignments. 
 
Thakral One’s 800 consultants across 12+ markets persistently endeavor to bring advanced domain, and technology expertise to solve process, technology, and data-related challenges. Our industry practitioners are focused on building strong institutional structures and competencies. 
 
We are parented by the Thakral Group, among Singapore's largest home-grown conglomerates with operations spanning 23 countries, 12,000 people worldwide. Thakral Group provides us with convenient access to global skills and expertise, a strong foothold in wider geographies, and the financial credibility to tackle larger client engagements.

description:
BitTitan® empowers IT service professionals to successfully deploy and manage cloud technologies through automation.

name: Aware
description:
Unblock and Unleash Collaboration in Teams & Yammer for All Employees!

Aware is the single-source solution to address compliance, data governance and 
human behavior risk within platforms like Microsoft Teams and Yammer. Satisfy concerns from key stakeholders like:

Legal & Compliance |  Information Security  |  Human Resources

Aware Product Overview
Monitoring
Automate community management of Yammer with configurable rules, conditions and responses. For example, monitor for inappropriate/harassing behavior or unsafe sharing practices that might lead to an insider threat.
Search & Discover
Give your customer’s eDiscovery team a more efficient, effective way to access private & public communication data—including edited or deleted content stored within the Aware archive. 
Retention
Allow your customer to apply their records retention policies and automatically purge select content from collaboration platform and the archive.
Data Holds
Preserve selected user’s content and satisfy the need to create and release legal holds.
User Data Removal
Remove all of a user’s authored content with the click of a button. This efficiently satisfies user data removal requests, as outlined by the GDPR.

Companies trust Aware to monitor and manage risk associated with the unstructured chat conversations in their Teams & Yammer environments.

name: MICROGENESIS BUSINESS SYSTEMS
description:
Microgenesis is a leading information technology solutions provider in the Philippines. Starting off in 1998 as a software company, it has rapidly evolved into a system solutions provider that is now witnessing strong growth rates over the years.

The clientele of the company are mainly the top 5000 corporations in the country, crossing through various industries that include banking and finance, manufacturing, trading, service providers, among others.

Microgenesis is known in the industry as a company that has built strong relationships with its customers through its business philosophy of being a trusted partner for its customer.

The emphasis of the company has always been on providing value-added services. With the new and emerging technologies, Microgenesis will continue to acquire and provide the latest solutions to better serve its clientele.

name: Calligo (US) Inc.
description:
Calligo is the world's first end-to-end managed data services provider, with a global track record in improving organizations' productivity & profitability by making their data more available, secure and safe.

Calligo puts data and its privacy at the heart of a unique collection of managed data services for SMEs and enterprises that optimize and protect data at every point of its journey through the organization. These include privacy- and security-centric IT managed services; the world’s first public cloud platform to have been designed with privacy at its heart; sophisticated data privacy adherence services; and enterprise-level, ‘privacy by design’ machine learning services and tools.

Calligo has earned a global reputation for managed services excellence, including twice winning Global MSP of the Year, being a longterm Gold Microsoft Partner and a member of both the CDN Top 100 Solutions Providers and the top 100 of the MSP 501.

Calligo is headquartered in Jersey with key locations in Canada, US, UK, Ireland, the Channel Islands and Luxembourg, while its operations and customers are worldwide. Calligo is backed by Investcorp, and since 2017 has successfully completed six international MSP acquisitions.

name: Plain Concepts
description:

Especialista en desarrollos disruptivos en Inteligencia Artificial, Realidad Mixta, Big Data, Blockchain, IoT y Cloud, la misión de Plain Concepts es ofrecer soluciones personalizadas, innovadoras y atractivas para todo tipo de necesidades digitales, incorporando siempre la última tecnología disponible.

Premiados en 2016 como Microsoft Partner del Año, actualmente contamos con una plantilla superior a los 350 empleados, marcando un hito dentro del sector tecnológico al contar con 12 profesionales reconocidos como MVP de Microsoft y más de una decena de certificaciones a nivel empresarial.

Con presencia en USA, UAE, UK, España, Alemania y Holanda, hemos desarrollado más de 2000 proyectos para compañías pertenecientes a todo tipo de sectores como BBVA, Microsoft, Acciona, Infojobs Brasil, Repsol, EDP, Telefónica, Asisa, Aenor, GroupM o IE.

Plain Concepts es Gold Partner de Microsoft, Microsoft AI Partner, Microsoft Mixed Reality Partner en Europa y USA y primero en España, y ha sido elegido Best Place to Work durante dos años consecutivos.

description:

Grâce à la convergence de nos savoir-faire, nous proposons des solutions pour construire l’entreprise intelligente et digitale de demain.

name: MMT Digital
description:
MMT Digital helps clients build digital products that transform business performance. Part agency, part consultancy, we are leaders in combining technology, experience design and lean product delivery, supporting senior technology leaders to digitally enable their businesses.

Digital isn’t a one size fits all business. We approach every brief with a blank slate. Whether you’re looking to create software or websites powered by Azure Cognitive Services or architect and build industry leading platforms with Azure, we have the experience to deliver.

name: Realtech NZ Limited

With a with a strong presence in New Zealand since 1997, Realtech focuses exclusively on providing the highest levels of solution advice, planning, guidance and services across SAP solutions for SMB and Large Enterprise organisations. 

Realtech built our pedigree in the Large Enterprise market, deploying and supporting SAP ECC and more recently the latest portfolio of SAP solutions. Following this success, Realtech became the first SAP Value-Added-Reseller across ANZ providing SAP solutions to the SMB market.

name: M-System LLP
description:
О компании

Группа компаний MONT начала свою деятельность в 1991 году и в настоящее время является одним из крупнейших в России дистрибьюторов программного обеспечения.
Сегодня MONT – это:

    Максимальный географический охват: филиалы во всех федеральных округах России, а также офисы в Азербайджане, Армении, Беларуси, Казахстане, Кыргызстане, Узбекистане. И для MONT это - не предел!
     
    Более 5000 партнёров, среди которых есть и ведущие системные интеграторы со штатом в несколько тысяч сотрудников, и небольшие компании, в которых один человек часто выполняет функции и директора, и менеджера по закупкам, и розничного продавца. Мы стремимся обеспечить одинаково высокий уровень сервиса в работе со всеми партнёрами. MONT найдет подход к каждому!
     
    Широкий продуктовый портфель, включающий как давно и хорошо известные программные продукты, так и решения от совсем молодых и перспективных игроков рынка. Комплексный проект у заказчика? У MONT подходящее решение найдется всегда!
     
    Техническая экспертиза и консультации. Сертифицированные специалисты MONT оказывают профессиональную поддержку по самым разным вопросам: от правил лицензирования ПО до правовой поддержки. Сложный вопрос? MONT поможет!
     

Ключевые направления бизнеса:

    Классическая дистрибуция: поставка лицензий по традиционной схеме (заказ от клиента, размещение заказа у дистрибутора, отгрузка со склада вендора, доставка партнёру, установка у заказчика)
     
    Экспертные решения: комплексные поставки программных продуктов и решений, а также пре-сейл, техническая и сервисная поддержка проектов
     
    Облачные сервисы: предоставление удалённого доступа к программным решениям и приложениям для создания частных облаков (ИТ-инфраструктуры) компании любого масштаба
     
    Электронная дистрибуция: канал продаж программного обеспечения, позволяющий доставлять электронные ключи напрямую от вендора в режиме онлайн, посредством технологической платформы MONT Webstore

name: Aware
description:
Unblock and Unleash Collaboration in Teams & Yammer for All Employees!

Aware is the single-source solution to address compliance, data governance and 
human behavior risk within platforms like Microsoft Teams and Yammer. Satisfy concerns from key stakeholders like:

Legal & Compliance |  Information Security  |  Human Resources

Aware Product Overview
Monitoring
Automate community management of Yammer with configurable rules, conditions and responses. For example, monitor for inappropriate/harassing behavior or unsafe sharing practices that might lead to an insider threat.
Search & Discover
Give your customer’s eDiscovery team a more efficient, effective way to access private & public communication data—including edited or deleted content stored within the Aware archive. 
Retention
Allow your customer to apply their records retention policies and automatically purge select content from collaboration platform and the archive.
Data Holds
Preserve selected user’s content and satisfy the need to create and release legal holds.
User Data Removal
Remove all of a user’s authored content with the click of a button. This efficiently satisfies user data removal requests, as outlined by the GDPR.

Companies trust Aware to monitor and manage risk associated with the unstructured chat conversations in their Teams & Yammer environments.

name: Compello AS
description:
Compello Gruppen har som målsetning å bli en ledende aktør i Europa innenfor områdene EDI, eFaktura og fakturagodkjenning. Hver eneste dag etterstreber vi om å tilrettelegge for at organisasjoner spiller bra sammen. Dette gjør vi ved å håndtere fakturaer, transaksjoner og andre bilag på en trygg, rask og sikker måte. Nettopp derfor er vår visjon – We make organizations play well together!

Compello Gruppen utgjør mer enn 90 ansatte fordelt i Oslo, Larvik, Stockholm og München. Vi etterlever våre verdier om å være til å stole på, modige, lagspillere og lekne. Hovedkontoret ligger på Fornebu utenfor Oslo hvor store deler av våre utviklere, økonomer, selgere, konsulenter, markedsførere, ledere og support-konsulenter er lokalisert.

Våre kollegaer, samarbeidspartnere og kunder er drivkraften i vår virksomhet. Sammen med våre partnere har Compello Gruppen mer enn 7000 kunder i 20 land. Dette utgjør mer enn 100.000 personer som bruker Compello-løsninger hver eneste dag.

Som et internasjonalt selskap er Compello opptatt av å være en god samfunnsaktør og arbeidsgiver. Vi har derfor inngått noen strategiske samarbeid for å bidra til et samfunn for innovasjon, mangfold og et bedre miljø. Compello driver konkrete tiltak for å øke kvinneandelen og har per i dag en av IT-bransjens høyeste kvinneandel på 40%.

name: Arrow Business Communications Ltd
description:
Arrow specialises in telephony, data and IT solutions. We offer a diverse portfolio ranging from IT services, hosted telephony and mobiles through to mobile device management, telephone systems, video conferencing, voice and data connectivity. We have over 5,000 customers, many of whom purchase multiple products and services from us, choosing Arrow as their partner year after year. 

We can fully scale our solutions to any industry sector and across any customer size, from SME and Enterprise clients through to multi-site corporate accounts.

Our energy and strengths lie in our ability to guide customers through real business challenges in the IT & telecoms space such as migrating from legacy infrastructure, business continuity, resiliency and supplier consolidation. Dedicated points of contact across our operations, technical, product and account management teams enable us to deliver a smooth transition to new platforms.

We are committed to providing a comprehensive package of support for your business. Our fully managed IT service provides our customers with a comprehensive solution to supporting their IT services. Arrow’s IT Managed Service provides a flexible, cost effective approach to addressing your IT challenges and for harnessing technology to drive the business forward with IT.

• Proven track record – Arrow supports single and multi-site customers offering dedicated contact points that have in-depth knowledge of the IT & telecoms marketplace and are experienced at dealing with every element of the project from audit, fact find, transition and implementation through to on-going support and management.

• Consolidation of Suppliers - We have product and technical specialists who can work with you to help shape your technology strategy. 

• Best of Breed Products – as you will see we have only advocated the very best products and services. This experience of knowing exactly the right product for each requirement provides all our clients with the reassurance and confidence that we are the right choice to partner with.

• Nationwide Engineers - Arrow’s fleet of system engineers are located nationwide to ensure the fastest possible response should a critical site visit be required. As each engineer specialises in a different system manufacturer, this provides a broad skill set across the team and the ability to maintain all systems.
